abstract: Wadsworth Atheneum art museum in Hartford, Conn, prepares to open its Morgan Memorial Building after five-year, $33 million renovation and, for first time in 50 years, will have all galleries open to public at once; ambitious and overdue project was instigated by Susan L Talbott, who became director at extreme low point for museum.
lead_paragraph: On Sept. 19, this Hartford institution will present the results of its five-year, $33 million renovation.

headline.main: The Wadsworth Atheneum in Hartford Puts Final Touches on a Comeback
headline.print_headline: Putting Final Touches on a Comeback

snippet: On Sept. 19, this Hartford institution will present the results of its five-year, $33 million renovation.
